Ansonsten super Spiel. Kann man nicht meckern.

Killers camp too much. Maybe make it so that the bleed out on hooks pauses if they're within 10 meters of you. Sick of killer just standing their watching survivor bleed out on hook.

Steam wanted me to revise my review for breaking 100 hours of game play. I still stand by this review. Maybe add a character that has a perk that stops the hook timer so the killer doesn't know that they're just wasting their time.

뭐 이게임 모르면 맞아야하는건 하루이틀이 아니라서 이해는 하는데
매칭시스템만 완화해주면 지금보다 훨씬 재밌게 할수있을듯

별개로 최근에 홈스홈이라고 소위 테바데인가 나온걸로 아는데
그겜이 더 흥해서 메튜가 좀 자극을 받았으면 좋겠음
개인적인 생각에 방송으로도 그렇고 게임하면서도 그렇고
느껴지는 문제점들이 한두개가 아님
근데 그걸 개발진이 모르진 않을텐데 개선이 안된다는건
어차피 이겜만한 게임이 없으니 뭐같아도 다시 할사람은 할거라는
그런 마인드에서 나오는 운영이라고 밖에는 생각이 안됨
데바데로 생기는 수익을 개발진들 놀고먹는데 쓰고있는게 아니라면
그에 상응하는 제스처를 보여줬으면 함
Muito divertido haha!!!! joguei por 3 horas e já quis comprar 5 dlç ula ula
this game is great cant wait to see the next update!
good game, can be very spooky but it is a fun spooky, only problem is recent killer trickster who is not fun to play against and completely ruins the game

this game has turned my brain to dust but I keep playing it anyway, if that's your kind of thing go for it.

играла в эту игру на мобиле около года и наконец купила в стиме, как только собрала новый пк. очень крутая игра и совсем не надоедает блягодаря разнообразию карт, персонажей, перков и кастомизации. советую любителям подобных кооп игр.
Game definitely has it's problems, but the gameplay on both sides is pretty addictive and ultimately makes it worth the absolute pain and terrible balancing from the out of touch devs.

I can't bring myself to say this game is the perfect asymmetrical horror game, but its getting there. I'd say it's the best one out there but I haven't played them all yet. But, DBD is a fucking good ass game. It is a game you can play w friends (or solo) as survivor, or by yourself as killer. Both sides are fun af, and once you get into this game, it's hard to get out.

TL;DR good game, buy it during a sale and its worth

Coming from somebody who only plays killer I would say this is one of my favorite games. I would say the only things I dislike in this game are the very bad perk balancing for both sides and the really weird state that this game is in.

Das Matchmaking ist eine Katastrophe. Ich komme nicht weiter als Rang 5, weil ich dann trotzdem nur mit 15ern spiele und natürlich verliere. Sorry, aber so macht das keinen Sinn. Es gibt ja genug andere coole Spiele.
Have been playing since 2016, good game much fun with friends

The idea of the game is great, but the devs are doing a terrible job balancing this game so that it can be enjoyed by survivors and killers alike. I recommend you read about tournament rules just so that you have an idea how many restrictions they have to impose just to make it fair. Before you buy the game I will tell you exactly what the gameplay will look like and you can decide for yourself whether it is worth your bucks or not.

If you play as a killer, expect survivors to teabag and flashlight you on a frequent basis because why not, riiiiiiiiiiiiight?

As a survivor you can expect to be placed on a hook and have the killer standing right in front of you watching your scarce "gameplay" time go down the drain or wait for someone to unhook you just so that they can take you down again.Also, if you are lucky or good enough to finish all repairing all generators to earn your freedom, a beautiful killer perk called NOED will trigger and it basically means that the killer can take down any survivor in one hit, to make sure he will not end the match without a prize.

Do not forget that this game exist for more than long enough for all of these issues to be solved and there are even countless ideas from the gaming community itself to assist those blind developers but guess what!? THEY DON'T CARE!

Enjoy your game!

Game comes with Easy Anti-Cheat which randomly decides you have modified gamefiles when you have never touched them and kicks you out the game. You then have to uninstall and reinstall the whole thing just to play. Meanwhile it does nothing to prevent actual hackers, just casual gamers who have done literally nothing to the game files.
Oh, and the bugs can be pretty frustrating at times. Great concept, terrible execution.
Fun to play with my friends.
Not being able to change resolution and contrast kills this for me.

Fantastic game to play with our without friends! Each character has a backstory and character specific traits that feel like they belong in a horror movie! I look forward to more DLC!

UPDATE
1,000 hours later and I am still very much enjoying this game. The DLC that has come out in the year I have been playing and I look forward to more!
a game that has polished and has a great community

Das Spiel macht echt Spaß, vor allem wenn man mit Freunden zusammen am Telefonieren ist.
Abwechlungsreich und Dynamisch.
Great updates and so much fun with friends!

uno dei migliori giochi "horror", pur avendo i suoi pro e contro, ed i suoi bug e glitch, rimane il mio gioco preferito da giocare, sul mercato ce ne sono pochi di giochi come DbD, potresti dire "c'è Friday the 13th" no, ft13 non è in grado di dare testa a DbD, home sweet home? potrebbe avere delle occasioni per dare filo da torcere in DbD, ma in futuro. Fatto sta che DbD pur essendo come ho detto con alcuni bug o "disuguaglianze" non bilanciate tra killer e survivor, rimane comunque un gioco divertente e bello da giocare, se volete giocare ad un gioco abbastanza horror che vi diverta e a cui sapete di poter migliorare giocandoci, è l'ora di comprarlo. un consiglio prima di iniziare a giocare da killer: 1 NON usare lo spirito, 2 NON camperare/face-camperare 3 quando giochi da survivor NON T-beggare, fidatevi ve lo dico per il vostro bene.
Jogo bom, comunidade nem um pouco toxica, Recomendo jogar com pelo menos 1 amigo, jogar sozinho dead by dylight é muito triste.

good game
buy and play with me
